name: GetCampaignJourneyMetrics
description:
Retrieve journey metrics for a specific campaign.

This tool retrieves a list of journey metrics for a specified campaign. It provides insights into how many people triggered the campaign and other related metrics within a specified time period and resolution. Useful for campaign performance analysis.

parameters.name: start_timestamp
parameters.description: The UNIX timestamp marking the start of the journey metrics report period.

value_schema.description: The unix timestamp for the beginning of your journey metrics report.

parameters.name: end_timestamp
parameters.description: The Unix timestamp marking the end of the journey metrics report period.

value_schema.description: The unix timestamp for the end of your journey metrics report.

parameters.name: metrics_resolution
parameters.description: Determines the increment for metrics reporting: hourly, daily, weekly, or monthly.

value_schema.description: Determines increment for metrics—hourly, daily, weekly, or monthly.

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The ID of the campaign to return journey metrics for.

value_schema.description: The ID of the campaign that you want to trigger or return information about.

value_schema.description: The unix timestamp for the end of your journey metrics report.
